name: Dig Deep - Game Jam
description:
Dig Deep is a survival, psychological horror game developed by Next Gen Softworks for the Unreal Mega Jam.

A drill ship, sent out by the Aldera Corp Deep Earth Mining company, finds itself in trouble when a mysterious explosion sends it to the bottom of the ocean. Most of the crew died, however those that remain are on the verge of insanity. 

Outside of the ship, however, lies an even greater threat. An ancient evil roams the seafloor, looking for prey and sucking the life from it's victims. To most, they're rumours, tales of old told to scare young children, but today... Today is the day you find out if they're real...

If you survive, that is...
